formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: DAHDIDNDon Synopsis: Toggle DAHDI channel Do Not Disturb status ON Privilege: <none>

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 () to 1.4 ():
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 () to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,3 +1,3 @@ - Action: ZapDNDon - Synopsis: Toggle Zap channel Do Not Disturb status ON + Action: DAHDIDNDon + Synopsis: Toggle DAHDI channel Do Not Disturb status ON Privilege: <none>
